page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: Marc, Nicky, Louisa, Mum, Dad and Bruno the dog. FRIDAY Nicky and I woke up at the same time while half an hour later my mum wakes up and shouts at Nicky for whistling at the top of his voice. Meanwhile my dad is doing his job. He is a postman. At quarter to eight we have our breakfast. Nicki and Lousia start moaning at me because I have had seconds. At half past eight a.m Wayne knocks for me and then I go to school. Meanwhile my dad is having a cup of coffee at the post office cafe. My mum is at home doing the washing up. Then she waits three quarters of an hour for a bus to go to Croydon, shopping. At 12 o'clock my dad comes home and turns on the cricket. Then I'll be having my dinner at school. My mum
